pr_title: HBASE-24267 add limit support for scan in rest api

timeline.bodyText: Nit: Avoid renumbering previous existing fields? Not that this would be a big deal, since this protobuf message is used within REST only, but better to avoid unnecessary changes in the protocol.
timeline.author: wchevreuil

replies.bodyText: Yeah, what Wellington said. Add new field. Add deprecation of the old.
replies.author: saintstack
